snippet.title: Indie Zombie Survival Game "ZED ZONE - APOCALYPSE AHEAD" - Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
"ZED ZONE - APOCALYPSE AHEAD" is a top-down, open-world survival craft game set in a zombie apocalypse, made by a single developer (me).

It's not easy for a single developer to make a openworld survival game.
Please like this video if you are interested in this game.

Wishlist on Steam :
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1211600/ZED_ZONE

Join us on discord:
https://discord.gg/ubSwvGgMuJ

"ZED ZONE - APOCALYPSE AHEAD" is an open world survival craft base building game, made by a single developer, set on a zombie-apocalyptic world.
The game map is seamless and procedurally generated.
You need to craft items and weapons, upgrade your technology, and eventually escape. 
Good luck, survivor.

Follow the dev on Twitter: https://twitter.com/INDIEDEV_LIU

Release Date: Early Access Spring 2023

Thanks for watching :D


#zombiesurvival #indiegame #indiedev #IndieGameDev #gamedevs #gamedev #Kickstarter #Steam #zombies #madewithunity #pixelart #Left4Dead #Indiegames #ZEDZONE #indiegameplay
